paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on TTR variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: It has been shown that amyloid fibrils contain a high percentage of wild-type TTR for individuals heterozygous for the Val30Met variant.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant is known to destabilize the TTR tetramer, leading to increased amyloidogenicity.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.additional_notes: The Val30Met variant is one of the most studied mutations in TTR-related amyloidosis.
key_quotes: Point mutations in the TTR gene often result in early onset of disease, presumably due to destabilization of the tetramer, rendering the protein prone to dissociation and aggregation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was successfully extracted.
